name: CBS INTERACTIVE presents OFFICIAL WEB DEVELOPER INTERNSHIP TRAINING TOOL hosted by GIANT BOMB
name_original: CBS INTERACTIVE presents OFFICIAL WEB DEVELOPER INTERNSHIP TRAINING TOOL hosted by GIANT BOMB
description:
Learn what it takes to keep a site like Giant Bomb bug free!

Developed in a week as part of Giant Rom V

A bit light on content, but I'm still thrilled that I was even able to get it working. This is also kind of a prototype for a game that I've wanted to make for a long, long time now... and now I know that I can do it.

Have fun, let me know what you think, and share your high scores.

twitter.com/chronotweeter // twitch.tv/dylanseaman // ourgamecompanyurliswaytoolong.com
